dialogue: You are Captain Arielle, a renowned underwater explorer.
Today, you embark on a daring expedition to uncover the secrets hidden beneath the ocean's surface. As you descend into the depths, you face a series of choices that will shape your journey.
You stand at the edge of the research vessel, ready to plunge into the unknown.

options.text: Dive straight down into the abyss

descent.tscn.question: What will you do?

dialogue: Your decision leads you deeper into the ocean.
Suddenly, you stumble upon a dark cavern. Inside, you see eerie bioluminescent creatures dancing around.

options.text: Proceed cautiously, intrigued by the mysterious beauty

cavern.tscn.question: What will you do?

dialogue: As you explore further, you stumble upon the remains of an ancient shipwreck.

options.text: Continue your journey, wary of potential dangers lurking nearby
Investigate the wreckage for any valuable artifacts

shipwreck.tscn.question: What will you do?

dialogue: You come across a vibrant coral reef teeming with life. However, you notice a passage hidden within the coral maze.

options.text: Venture into the passage, curious about what lies beyond
Stay and observe the marine life, appreciating the beauty of the reef

reef.tscn.question: What will you do?

dialogue: Your journey leads you to a deep trench, where darkness envelops everything.

options.text: Dive deeper into the trench, eager to unravel its mysteries
Stay at the rim of the trench, cautious of the unknown depths below

trench.tscn.question: What will you do?

dialogue: Suddenly, you encounter a massive creature, unlike anything you've ever seen.

options.text: Approach the creature cautiously, hoping to learn more about it
Retreat and find a safer route to continue your exploration

encounter.tscn.question: What will you do?

dialogue: Your bravery pays off as you make a groundbreaking discovery

options.text: Document your findings and share them with the world
Keep the discovery a secret, fearing its exploitation by others

discovery.tscn.question: What will you do?

dialogue: Your expedition comes to an end as you ascend back to the surface, carrying with you the memories of your extraordinary journey.

options.text: Plan your next expedition, eager to delve deeper into the ocean's mysteries
Reflect on your experiences, cherishing the wonders you've witnessed

return.tscn.question: What will you do?
